scripts.clean: cargo clean && cd frontend && rm -rf node_modules/.vite
scripts.clean:old: cargo sweep --time 7 || echo 'Install cargo-sweep: cargo install cargo-sweep'
scripts.lint: pnpm run frontend:lint && pnpm run backend:lint
scripts.format: cargo fmt --all && cd frontend && pnpm run format
scripts.check: pnpm run frontend:check && pnpm run backend:check
scripts.dev: export FRONTEND_PORT=$(node scripts/setup-dev-environment.js frontend) && export BACKEND_PORT=$(node scripts/setup-dev-environment.js backend) && export HOST=$(node scripts/setup-dev-environment.js host) && concurrently "pnpm run backend:dev:watch" "pnpm run frontend:dev"
scripts.backend:dev: BACKEND_PORT=$(node scripts/setup-dev-environment.js backend) pnpm run backend:dev:watch
scripts.backend:dev:watch: DISABLE_WORKTREE_ORPHAN_CLEANUP=1 RUST_LOG=debug cargo watch -w crates -x 'run --bin server'
scripts.remote:dev: cd crates/remote && docker compose --env-file .env.remote up --build ; docker compose down -v
